_sText:
Aperture Science now operates a prison facility.

24 Guard Spawns and 40 Prisoner spawns for a total of 64.

Energy barriers malfunction in 30 seconds.

Switch in the corner operates platform. It lowers. Use it like big cage.

Everything is in the BSP.

Screenshots are old.

Screenshots don't show the best area. :P

I didn't get to put everything I wanted in here. I may make a v2 eventually.

I will set up a server for this sometime this week.

I know that the metal walls look like they're covered in oil but I'm tired of working on this.

Please enjoy. This was a lot of work.
